# PRD: Simple Feature

## Overview

A basic PRD with 3 simple stories for testing.

## User Stories

### [ ] US-001: Add Configuration File

**As a** developer
**I want** a configuration file
**So that** settings can be customized

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create config.json with default settings
- [ ] Add README documentation

### [ ] US-002: Add Help Command

**As a** user
**I want** a help command
**So that** I can learn available options

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add --help flag
- [ ] Display usage information

### [ ] US-003: Add Version Command

**As a** user
**I want** to check the version
**So that** I know which version is installed

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add --version flag
- [ ] Display current version
